Criteria for Evaluation and Selection of Data Bases and Data Base Services .A Williams, M.E. Libraries, as potential users of bibliographic data base services, will need to evaluate not only the contents of the many data bases available but the different services provided by various processing centers.  Criteria for selection of data bases and data base services such as searching features, logical capacity, document delivery, output format and medium, and costs are examined. .X 124	1	1376 125	2	1376 127	2	1376 128	2	1376 129	2	1376 130	1	1376 141	1	1376 190	1	1376 191	2	1376 197	1	1376 211	1	1376 214	1	1376 218	1	1376 243	1	1376 307	2	1376 330	2	1376 339	1	1376 363	2	1376 370	1	1376 376	1	1376 378	1	1376 387	1	1376 409	1	1376 432	1	1376 450	1	1376 451	1	1376 452	1	1376 453	1	1376 459	2	1376 460	1	1376 461	1	1376 468	1	1376 484	1	1376 492	1	1376 508	1	1376 511	1	1376 512	1	1376 514	1	1376 518	1	1376 520	1	1376 523	1	1376 524	1	1376 525	1	1376 526	1	1376 529	1	1376 530	1	1376 534	1	1376 546	1	1376 553	1	1376 579	1	1376 580	1	1376 594	1	1376 603	1	1376 604	1	1376 606	1	1376 609	1	1376 610	1	1376 611	2	1376 612	1	1376 622	1	1376 623	1	1376 625	1	1376 626	1	1376 629	1	1376 630	1	1376 636	1	1376 637	1	1376 642	3	1376 643	1	1376 644	1	1376 645	2	1376 646	2	1376 647	1	1376 648	2	1376 649	1	1376 650	2	1376 651	1	1376 652	1	1376 692	1	1376 696	1	1376 699	1	1376 703	1	1376 705	1	1376 708	2	1376 726	1	1376 727	1	1376 728	1	1376 729	1	1376 731	1	1376 732	1	1376 733	1	1376 734	2	1376 736	2	1376 737	1	1376 738	2	1376 739	3	1376 740	2	1376 741	2	1376 742	2	1376 743	3	1376 744	3	1376 748	1	1376 755	1	1376 757	1	1376 820	1	1376 826	2	1376 827	1	1376 831	1	1376 879	2	1376 881	1	1376 882	1	1376 883	3	1376 884	1	1376 885	2	1376 886	1	1376 887	1	1376 893	1	1376 917	1	1376 999	1	1376 1000	1	1376 1001	1	1376 1002	1	1376 1003	1	1376 1004	2	1376 1035	1	1376 1078	1	1376 1089	1	1376 1091	1	1376 1207	1	1376 1264	2	1376 1297	1	1376 1303	1	1376 1356	2	1376 1364	1	1376 1368	2	1376 1370	2	1376 1372	2	1376 1373	1	1376 1374	5	1376 1375	5	1376 1376	8	1376 1377	3	1376 1403	1	1376 1457	1	1376 1457	1	1376
